annotation.spannedText: the risk of severe complications, hopsitalization or death from vaccine-preventable disease is much greater

classMention.mentionClass: the risk of severe complications, hopsitalization or death from vaccine-preventable disease is much greater

annotation.spannedText: The benefits of vaccination far outweigh the risks

classMention.mentionClass: The benefits of vaccination far outweigh the risks

annotation.spannedText: All vaccine ingredients are tested to be safe

classMention.mentionClass: All vaccine ingredients are tested to be safe

annotation.spannedText: in most cases vaccine side effects are minor and go away within a few days

classMention.mentionClass: in most cases vaccine side effects are minor and go away within a few days

annotation.spannedText: the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

classMention.mentionClass: the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

annotation.spannedText: Parents should keep an eye out for any unusual condition, such as a high fever, weakness, or behavior changes

classMention.mentionClass: Parents should keep an eye out for any unusual condition, such as a high fever, weakness, or behavior changes

annotation.spannedText: In the unlikely case that your child experiences signs of allergic reaction or a side effect, you should contact your doctor immediately
